00020 /* include header defining the interface of the source. */
00021 #include "emptytimeedit.h"
00022 
00023 /* create a time edit gui object with special value text. */
00024 EmptyTimeEdit::EmptyTimeEdit(const QTime &time, QWidget *parent) : QTimeEdit(time, parent) {
00025     this->setSpecialValueText(emptyTimeText);
00026 }
00027 
00028 /* create a time edit gui object with special value text. */
00029 EmptyTimeEdit::EmptyTimeEdit(QWidget *parent) : QTimeEdit(parent) {
00030     this->setSpecialValueText(emptyTimeText);
00031 }
00032 
00033 /* deconstructor of empty time edit gui object. */
00034 EmptyTimeEdit::~EmptyTimeEdit() {}
00035 
00036 /* redefine the clear method to set the minimum time. */
00037 void
00038 EmptyTimeEdit::clear() {
00039     this->setTime(this->minimumTime());
00040 }
00041 
00042 /* check the time with the minimum time. */
00043 QTime
00044 EmptyTimeEdit::emptyTime() const {
00045     if (time() == this->minimumTime())
00046         return QTime();
00047 
00048     return time();
00049 }
00050 
00051 /* redefine the set method, and if the
00052    time is null then set it to minimum. */
00053 void
00054 EmptyTimeEdit::setTime(const QTime &time) {
00055     if (time.isNull())
00056         QTimeEdit::setTime(this->minimumTime());
00057 
00058     QTimeEdit::setTime(time);
00059 }
